adminLogin.title: Auto Login
adminLogin.name: adminLogin
adminLogin.description: Login saves time while logging in to our wordpress or old template sites. Just set up your credentials on the User Credentials Page.

comboVideoUpgrade.title: Video Upgrader
comboVideoUpgrade.name: comboVideoUpgrade
comboVideoUpgrade.description: Replaces old Silent Animation and Human Touch Video code with the new shortcode option.

mapFix.title: Map Fix
mapFix.name: mapFix
mapFix.description: Strips out old broken map code and replaces it with the [MAP] shortcode.

ulFix.title: Fix Lists
ulFix.name: ulFix
ulFix.description: Removes &#13; from the source code to prevent lists from breaking.

copyInfo.title: Copy Info
copyInfo.name: copyInfo
copyInfo.description: Copies Information from old template sites. Useless without Paste Info.

pasteInfo.title: Paste Info
pasteInfo.name: pasteInfo
pasteInfo.description: Pastes information previously copied with Copy Info. Useless without Copy Info.

purgeCustomStyles.title: Purge Custom Styles
purgeCustomStyles.name: purgeCustomStyles
purgeCustomStyles.description: Purge the custom css generated through the design options.

purgeFiles.title: Purge theme.css
purgeFiles.name: purgeFiles
purgeFiles.description: Equivalent to using the 'Purge Files' button in the admin. This will clear the cached theme.css file and reload the page.

purgeMinified.title: Purge Minified Files
purgeMinified.name: comboVideoUpgrade
purgeMinified.description: Equivalent to using the 'Purge Files' button in the admin with the minify option. This will clear the minified files and reload the page.

themeInfo.title: Theme Info
themeInfo.name: themeInfo
themeInfo.description: Returns the theme directory of the current page.

dnsLookup.title: DNS Lookup
dnsLookup.name: dnsLookup
dnsLookup.description: Returns dns information for the current site. Similar to dnsStuff

purgeCodeCache.title: Purge Code Cache
purgeCodeCache.name: purgeCodeCache
purgeCodeCache.description: Purge the memory cache for php files on wordpress sites.

liveWidgetView.title: Live Widget View
liveWidgetView.name: liveWidgetView
liveWidgetView.description: Loads into the live widget view for a wordpress site.
